name: Silent girl
description:
Silent girls  is a scary experience, or to prove your point you have to bring photos of the objects you encounter. Be careful, some effects seem to occur as time goes by.. Try to get home without getting caught by the shadowman and show what's really happen in you're path home.

You play Ella, a young girl just out of school. 

Mute to prove to others what she sees and tries to photograph what happens to her on the way. But it's a dangerous game she's playing and it's not a happy ending if the entity catches up with her..

Control:  
The arrows at the edges of the screen allow you to move backwards and forwards.

-> Your inventory allows you to look at the photos you've already taken and see how corrupt they are.

->Your camera allows you to take a selfie the most of the time to see where the shadowman is.

There is 3 version of the picture to give you an idee of what you sould do, run or not maybe .

->The eye indicate you can take a picture of the object. 

-> this is the Shadowman which is looks like a real bad guy so don't let him caught you.

-> If the effects of pictures are to strongh for you , you can drop them , you have to swipe below.

The objects have different effects :


Have fun !

->Sacha Jacquemin
